title: Full Metal Jacket movie poster type
content:
Is anyone able to identify the fonts used in the poster for Full Metal Jacket -- available here:

[http://www.impawards.com/1987/full\_metal\_jacket.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024043511/http:/www.impawards.com/1987/full_metal_jacket.html "http://www.impawards.com/1987/full\_metal\_jacket.html")

Specifically, I'm interested in the movie title itself. I believe the top copy is ITC Eras Ultra (from comments from other folks trying to help me out.)

Thanks!
author: sashae

comments.content:
At least your folks are right about the top copy.  
Movie title face might be custom.

Not the same, but you might like [Gamer.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024043511/http:/www.canadatype.com/showfont.php?id=41)

- Lex
No it's not. There are substantial differences unfortunately.
I wouldn't be surprised if it was custom lettering. It doesn't look like any font I know of.
